question: The variations of resistivity œÅ with absolute temperature T for three different materials X, Y and Z are shown in the graph below. Identify the materials X, Y and Z.
images/e3b6a935-7d8b-4a3d-9c4e-123456789025_1.png
choices: X - copper, Y - semiconductor, Z - nichrome
X - semiconductor, Y - nichrome, Z - copper
X - nichrome, Y - copper, Z - semiconductor
X - copper, Y - nichrome, Z - semiconductor
explanation: Graph X shows resistivity increasing non-linearly (typical for metals like Copper at low T).
Graph Y shows resistivity increasing linearly but with a higher value/intercept (typical for alloys like Nichrome).
Graph Z shows resistivity decreasing with temperature (typical for Semiconductors).
